mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category (member_no, id, group_no, ref_no, depth, title, state, reg_date, upt_date) VALUES (#{member_no}, #{id}, #{group_no}, #{ref_no}, #{depth}, #{title}, ‘Y’, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM category WHERE REPLACE(title, ' ', '') CONCAT (’%’, #{keyword}, ‘%’) OR id CONCAT (’%’, #{keyword}, ‘%’)
SELECT * FROM category WHERE REPLACE(title, ' ', '') CONCAT (’%’, #{title}, ‘%’)
SELECT * FROM category WHERE id CONCAT (’%’, #{id}, ‘%’)
